testcase.name: Cicek Sepeti urun arama
testcase.system-out: Given "cicek sepeti" sitesine gidilir.......................................passed When hediye linki tiklanir..................................................passed And dogum gunu linki tiklanir...............................................passed Then dogum gunu sayfasinda oldugu dogrulanir................................passed When renk drop down tiklanir................................................passed Then sirasiyla renkler secilir..............................................passed
